column4: I have a system that's been running mkfs.ext3 (1.3x TiB) for about 24 hours now.  How can I determine if it's hung or actually still working??
I have a system that's been running mkfs.ext3 (1.3x TiB) for about 24 hours now.  How can I determine if it's hung or actually still working??
I will go out on a limb and say its locked up
I cant imagine more then an hour, but havent made an ext3 in a while
